data.project_description: Krisumi Corporation is poised to unveil the extraordinary Krisumi Waterfall Residences, a luxurious residential haven in Gurgaon that promises to leave a lasting impression. This groundbreaking collaboration between Sumitomo Corp, a renowned Japanese entity, and Krishna Group, a distinguished Indian organization, combines their collective expertise and cutting-edge technology to create a truly unique living experience. As the first project of its kind in India to involve a Japanese company, Krisumi Waterfall Residences pioneers the art of Japanese living, seamlessly integrating it into Indian homes. This innovative residency promises to set a new standard for luxury and sophistication in the Indian real estate market.
projectRedefine_Connectivity: Located in Sector 36A on Dwarka Expressway Gurgaon
data.meta_description: Krisumi Waterfall Residences Offers 2/3 LDK with World Class Amenities in Sector 36A Gurgaon. Krisumi Corporation is the First Indo-Japanese Real Estate Project
data.meta_title: Krisumi Waterfall Residences - Sector 36A Dwarka Expressway Gurgaon
data.AboutDeveloper: An enterprising collaboration between Sumitomo Corporation, Japan and Krishna Group, India, Krisumi is a convergence of Kriya, meaning creation in Sanskrit, and Sumi, the Japanese word for fine living. Our endeavour is to conceptualize, design and build homes which are characterized by the highest standards of Japanese craftsmanship, in sizes that complement today’s ever-evolving way of life. By unifying Japanese design aesthetics with the warmth of Indian hospitality, we at Krisumi are giving shape to architectural masterpieces that are spectacular in form, and highly practical in function.

highlight.highlight_Point: Krisumi Corporation launching soon new project Krisumi City Gurgaon Waterfall Residences with world class amenities.
1st phase to have over 450 apartments (1.2 million sq ft) and will be completed in 4-5 years.
Construction of the 1st phase of the project expected to commence this year.
Township spread over 65 acres will be developed in 7-8 phases with around 5,000 apartments (18 million sq ft approx) over 10 years.
The project will also feature a high-end retail mall, education institutions, a premium hotel and premium office spaces.
The master plan and architectural design of Krisumi City Gurgaon is developed by world renowned Japanese design firm NIKKEN SEKKEI.

data.project_description: Amidst the dynamic energy of a thriving city, where ambitions converge with the heartbeat of urban existence, lies a symbol of strength, durability, and prestige. This is the story of Signature Global Titanium SPR in Sector 71, Gurugram. Reflecting the attributes of the metal it is named after, this project represents robustness and timeless endurance, providing a sanctuary of enduring quality and timeless elegance.
projectRedefine_Connectivity: Proposed along SPR, Sector 55/56 to Vatika Chowk
projectRedefine_Entertainment: Boosting connectivity across Delhi, UP, Haryana & Rajasthan
projectRedefine_Business: Proposed along SPR, Sector 55/56 to Vatika Chowk
projectRedefine_Education: 1,000-acre mixed-use project with workspaces, retail & social infrastructure.

data.AboutDeveloper: Signature Global Titanium SPR is an exquisite real estate project developed by Signature Global, a brand synonymous with excellence and innovation in the realty sector. Signature Global stands for 'Superbness in the Trinity Of Men, Materials, and Money,' embodying the company's core values of quality, timely delivery, and superior craftsmanship. Signature Global is renowned for its groundbreaking and unparalleled concepts, offering multi-dimensional real estate solutions and exceptional service standards. The company is committed to creating state-of-the-art real estate masterpieces and consistently attracts the best talent in the industry. With rich experience in the real estate domain, Signature Global leverages a network of elite intermediaries, financial institutions, high-net-worth individuals, and some of the most reputable designers in India.

data.project_description: M3M Altitude, situated in Sector 65, Gurgaon, is a paragon of luxury living, offering a sublime residential experience. These sumptuous apartments are crafted to meet the refined tastes of the modern homeowner, harmoniously balancing elegance, comfort, and convenience. The development boasts an array of world-class amenities, including a cutting-edge fitness center, an opulent swimming pool, a stylish clubhouse, and exquisitely landscaped gardens. Strategically located, M3M Altitude ensures seamless connectivity to major thoroughfares, upscale shopping centers, gourmet dining options, and entertainment venues. With its robust security measures and eco-friendly practices, this development redefines the pinnacle of luxury living, making it the ultimate haven for discerning individuals.
projectRedefine_Connectivity: Situated on 60 metre wide main arterial Sector road
projectRedefine_Entertainment: Prominently located on Southern Peripheral Road (Golf Course Extension Road) one of the widest roads in Gurgaon (90 meters wide) and recently announced as NH 236
projectRedefine_Business: Strategically linked to all major Business Hubs & Retail destinations
projectRedefine_Education: Just 30 minute drive from Delhi International Airport

data.project_description: Ganga Realty Fusion 85, situated in Sector 85, Gurgaon, is a masterpiece of contemporary architecture and innovative design. This iconic development features sleek high-rise towers nestled amidst lush greenery and beautifully landscaped gardens, creating a tranquil oasis for its residents. The apartments are thoughtfully designed to maximize natural light and ventilation, offering breathtaking views of the surrounding landscape. The strategic location of Ganga Apartments in Sector 85, Gurgaon, is a significant factor in its popularity. The sector's seamless connectivity to major roads and highways, including National Highway 48 and the Dwarka Expressway, ensures effortless access to Delhi and other key areas of Gurgaon, making it a coveted destination for discerning homeowners.
projectRedefine_Connectivity: Ganga Realty Sector 85 Luxury Apartments have located in Sector 85. And we know that it is a growing area.

projectRedefine_Business: You can catch prime locations from Ganga Realty Sector 85 Luxury Apartments Gurgaon.
projectRedefine_Education: Our luxurious property is away from noisy palaces as well as populated areas.

data.project_description: Ganga Nandaka, located in Sector 84, Gurgaon, is a prestigious residential project developed by Ganga Realty, a renowned name in Indian real estate. Spanning over 8.35 acres, the project offers luxurious amenities and enjoys a prime location in Gurgaon, a burgeoning hub in the real estate landscape. Situated near the Ganga Motorway, which connects Gurgaon with Delhi, residents benefit from excellent connectivity and easy access to major destinations. Ganga Nandaka is designed to cater to the discerning tastes of modern living, promising a blend of comfort, convenience, and luxury.
projectRedefine_Connectivity: This project is nearest to National Highway 48 and offers location advantages to residents.
projectRedefine_Entertainment: Sohna Road is 20 min drive from this project.
projectRedefine_Business: Sector 84 is a few minut drive from Dwarka Expressway.
projectRedefine_Education: It is closest to the South Delhi transportation routes.
data.meta_description: Step into a home that manifests all things that bring you joy. Verdant landscapes and cleaner air welcome you to a quintessential urban life in Sector 84.
